name: restaurant-management-system
description: A comprehensive restaurant management system for small to medium-sized restaurants

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test:backend:payment:unit: cd backend && npm run test:unit -- payment
scripts.test:backend:payment:e2e: cd backend && npm run test:e2e -- payment.e2e-spec.ts
scripts.test:frontend:payment: cd frontend && npm run test -- payment
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:payment: npm run test:backend:payment && npm run test:frontend:payment
scripts.test:payment:unit: npm run test:backend:payment:unit && npm run test:frontend:payment:unit
scripts.test:payment:e2e: npm run test:backend:payment:e2e && npm run test:frontend:payment:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:backend:e2e && npm run test:frontend:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend:unit && npm run test:backend:e2e && npm run test:frontend:unit && npm run test:frontend:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
